meanings: (좋다) nice, good, fine, all right, okay, (S) OK, (안전하다) safe, secure
(무방하다, 지장 없다) all right, okay, (S) OK
병원에 관한 표현 Do you know a good doctor?
옷가게에서 The length of the coat looks good.
레스토랑 찾기 Could you tell me a good Italian restaurant?
